start.description: The start time of the data being returned.

end.description: The exclusive end time of the data being returned.

intervals.description: The time slices of the timeseries data given in the `groups[].series` field.

Group.description: A grouped result, as requested by the `groupBy` request parameter.

by.description: These are key/value pairs, the key being the requested `groupBy` property with its corresponding value.

totals.description: These are key/value pairs, the key being the requested `field`, and the value the corresponding total over the requested time frame.

series.description: These are key/value pairs, the key being the requested `field`, and the value is an array of aggregated values. The array corresponds to the times given in the `intervals` array.
